item.title: What is the criteria for evaluating cruelty free investments
item.description: Cruelty-free investing means investing in companies, mutual funds, bonds, and other investment vehicles that do not support, cause, or contribute to animal exploitation and suffering. Before diving into the evaluation criteria I would like to brief on why an investor should check whether his investments are cruelty free

item.title: How do mutual funds lead to blood money
item.description: Mutual funds are a type of investment scheme that pools together investors money and invest it in different types of financial instruments such as stocks, bonds, government securities, gold, etc. Only when you see the holdings inside your mutual fund you would know the companies your money is invested in.
